pluginstrument.author: Nans Plancher
pluginstrument.description:
Lxnav S10x implementation for the got friends discus 2c glider
Features implemented : - 4 navboxes - Avg vario in the last 20 seconds - Netto - Altitude - TAS (True Air Speed) - Wind arrow : displays the eelative wind direction. The "true" wind direction and speed are displayed just below - Vario needle : displays the instant total energy - Red diamond: displays the Avg vario in the last 10 seconds - Yellow bar : displays the min and max vario values in the last 20 seconds - Blue arrow : not implemented, will display the MacCready setting
Video review/demo here : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dhCVyx4by5A Github repository : https://github.com/nan0/air-manager-instrument_lxnax-s10x
